sense.def:
Izraz
mess
uporabljamo za nekaj, kar je zelo razmetano in umazano ali neurejeno.

seg.quote: I know the place is a mess, but make yourself at home.
They went back to see how much mess they'd left behind.

sense.def:
Za razmere rečemo, da so
a mess
, kadar je veliko težav in neprijetnosti.

seg.quote: My life is such a mess.
It seemed a way out from the mess I'd got myself into.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in a mess
, je neurejeno.

seg.quote: Her hair was in a terrible mess.
The US economy is now in a mess.

sense.def:
A mess
je tudi soba ali stavba, v kateri jedo pripadniki oboroženih sil.

seg.quote: ...a bomb attack on an officers' mess.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
is messing about
ali
is messing around
, počne stvari brez posebnega cilja in ne da bi kaj naredil;

seg.quote: Some of the lads had been messing around when they should have been working.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
messes about
ali
messes around with something
, posega v tiste stvari in jih še poslabša.

seg.quote: She didn't want you coming and messing about with things.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
messes someone about
ali
around
, nenehno spreminja načrte, to pa tisto osebo prizadene;

Kadar človek
messes up something
, pokvari nekaj, kar je bilo skrbno narejeno.

seg.quote: That will mess up the whole analysis.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
messes up a room
, spravi sobo v nered ali jo umaže.
